mapper.insert: insert into VTFTMT.data_issue_record(custom_code, device, lot_id, ft_step, issue_type, issue_level, issue_path, issue_description, deal_flag, deal_description) value (#{customCode},#{device},#{lotId},#{ftStep},#{resource},#{issueType},#{issuLevel},#{issuePath},#{issueDescription},#{dealFlag});
